00249         static function write_stats($link, $page)
00250         {
00251         $userid = $_SESSION["user_id"];
00252 
00253         $query = "INSERT INTO users_statistics NULL, " .
00254              $userid . ", '" . $page . "', NOW()";
00255              
00256         echo "$query";
00257 
00258         $link->query($query);
00259   }
